long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pi Reminder Extension for Chrome: Add Tasks and Reminders for yourself and your friends.

To get the best benefit of Pi Reminder with all the unlocked features, download the Android App:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.piyushgaur.pireminder

What's new:
        - Migration to manifest v3
        - Bug Fixes

Manage your day with Task reminders, add future time reminders for yourself or for other people or a public reminder you wish everyone should know, Pi Reminder sets this for you, and syncs these reminders with all your devices running Pi Reminder.

Features:
✓ Set a Reminder for Other people, sitting at your place with just a few clicks.

✓ Set a Reminder for yourself with just a few clicks like a scrum meeting, picking your son from school and many more.

✓ Advanced repeat options: Add recurring reminders with advanced minutely, hourly, daily, weekly, monthly and yearly options.
Example: Every 2nd Monday of each month.

✓ Add Public Reminder for people like maybe a Music concert near your place.

✓ Get notified on your smartphone and your computer at the same time, so missing reminders would only happen if the world is attacked by Zombies.

✓ Quick Login with Facebook or Google+ account
In Pi reminder all you need to do is just login with your Facebook or Google+ account.

✓ Contacts Import
Contacts are automatically imported from your Google account when you choose to login via Google+

✓ Easy and friendly UI
An app whose smooth User Interface makes easy to add reminder, where you can view Timeline of the reminders added for you or by you, just depot your meetings schedulers to your app and be carefree. Also you can view all your reminders either in a popup window or full screen mode.


✓ Remind for anything
Add Birthday Reminder, ToDo / Task Reminder, Anniversary Reminder, Bills Reminder, Repeat Water Reminder or any other type of reminder with just a few clicks.


Our team started working on this chrome application when one of our user gave us her feedback. She explained, "My team-mate set a reminder via your android application for an important client meeting but my smartphone was on silent mode and was in my pocket and albeit I was working on my laptop making presentation for the client, I was completely unaware about the meeting. Maybe you guys can make something so people like us, stuck to our computer systems never miss our reminders".

And that's how we went on to make our Pi Reminder available on chrome web store.
